snippet: A deadline used to mean something in Congress, but amid signs of deep dysfunction, lawmakers have been unwilling or unable to act on matters of consequence to a wide range of Americans.
abstract: New level of Congressional deadlock may well mean that number of legislative priorities, including major immigration overhaul, farm bill, and score of fiscal deadlines, will not be dealt with in coming session; dysfunction, which has already caused number of real-world consequences for Americans, seems unprecedented in Congressional history.
lead_paragraph: A deadline used to mean something in Congress, but amid signs of deep dysfunction, lawmakers have been unwilling or unable to act on matters of consequence to a wide range of Americans.

headline.main: In Congress, Gridlock and Harsh Consequences
headline.print_headline: In Congress, Gridlock and Harsh Consequences
